name: fwdform2
description: A simple server for forwarding web forms to email addresses.

MAILGUN_API_KEY.description: The API key for your Mailgun domain.

REGISTRATION_ENABLED.description: Whether user (email recipient) registration is enabled.

REGISTRATION_PASSWORD.description: Password that must be provided when registering a new user.

DEFAULT_SENDER.description: The default sender ('from') email address used when forwarding a message form that does not include an 'email' parameter. If unset, fwdform@<MAILGUN_DOMAIN> will be used instead.
